name: Arcana Force XVIII - The Moon
effectText:
If this card is Summoned: Toss a coin.
●Heads: Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: You can Special Summon 1 "Moon Token" (Fairy/LIGHT/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0).
●Tails: Once per turn, during your End Phase: Target 1 monster you control; give control of it to your opponent.
